                     java.lang.String fontFile,
                     int size,
                     GLColor color)
        Generate a Bitmap based on the text message
        Parameters:
        context - active context
        text - text to display
        fontFile - font being used (from assets folder)
        size - font size
        color - color of the font
        Returns:
        Bitmap containing the desired text

      • buildTextBitmap

        public static Bitmap buildTextBitmap(Context context,
                     java.lang.String text,
                     java.lang.String fontFile,
                     int size,
                     GLColor color,
                     boolean underline)
        Generate a Bitmap based on the text message
        Parameters:
        context - active context
        text - text to display
        fontFile - font being used (from assets folder)
        size - font size
        color - color of the font
        underline - whether or not to underline the text
        Returns:
        Bitmap containing the desired text

        Returns the dimensions of the most recently generated text TODO there should be a better way of doing this, possibly pass the information back in buildTextBitmap
        Returns:
        Rect of the dimensions
